entry.title: Sunday: Periods of snow. Temperature falling to minus 18 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending late this afternoon then cloudy. Wind becoming north 20 km/h near noon. Temperature falling to minus 18 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 17 this morning and minus 28 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Clearing. Low minus 28.
entry.summary: Clearing late this evening. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 28. Wind chill minus 27 this evening and minus 33 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Sunday 22 January 2023
